title: Gumtree Local Ads - Buy & Sell
description:
Find local jobs, buy a phone or rent new property with Gumtree - the possibilities are endless. Whether you want to upgrade your house, sell that bike in the garage or simply discover shopping deals near your house, the Gumtree App is the answer.
Find local deals and benefit from thousands of ads ranging from a fashion to car deals, all within your reach.
TOP 5 REASONS TO DOWNLOAD:
-Find local ads: explore categories like Electronics, Property, Jobs, Cars & more to find what you’re looking for near you with ease
-Discover deals near you: view quality photos and detailed descriptions directly on the Gumtree app
-Connect with users: get in touch with the buyer or seller with the in-app messaging feature for quick, easy & secure correspondence
-Easily buy or sell: buy local deals or upload your own add straight from your mobile device, for free
-Share on social media: post your ad on Twitter, Facebook and other social media platforms to spread the word & find more interested buyers
Looking for a new home to rent near you? Hunt local property and get in touch today. Can’t decide if your next phone should be an iPhone or a Samsung? Save and manage your favourite ads and come back later. Need to make some space in your wardrobe after your latest fashion fix? Upload your ads in minutes and make money from preloved clothes with your phone.
With thousands of ads at your fingertips, you can explore thousands of shopping opportunities near you. Download Gumtree now and get started with buying and selling!
We are constantly working to improve the app so get in touch if there is anything you want to talk about. Leave a review, tell us at facebook.com/GumtreeSouthAfrica or tweet us @gumtreecoza.
